contents: This “alpha” state of the brain, enhanced by exposure to music, is identified as a relaxed state of alertness great for inspiration and learning facts. It is akin to a meditative state that puts us in touch with our own innate antenna-like qualities that helps us to tap into visions, powerful ideas, and creative thoughts along with internal sensations and feelings. By the time we reach the age of 14, however, it becomes more and more difficult for human beings to routinely access the alpha state.
